channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 神圣的磨牙仙子：牙仙子最近大出风头，一些孩子为兄弟姐妹赢得了百元大钞、名牌手链和巧克力。但是，随着父母们提高赌注，事情就变得尴尬了。
item.description: Holy Molar: the Tooth fairy is going big these days, Some kids are scoring $100 bills, designer bracelets and chocolates for siblings. But as parents up the ante, things get awkward. on.wsj.com/48mo0mY on.wsj.com/48mo0mY

item.title: 一幅小画可以改变你的生活，"神经美学 "科学家有证据表明，它还可以改善你的健康。
item.description: A teeny painting can change your life and "neuroaesthetic" scientists have evidence that it can also improve your health. on.wsj.com/3I7jiz3 on.wsj.com/3I7jiz3

item.title: 无论是在停机坪上还是在会议室里，超级富豪们都对这些便鞋赞不绝口

item.title: 我们毁了性爱吗？五位作家提出了一个问题：在人类最亲密的行为方面，社会是否已经迷失了方向？
item.description: Have we ruined sex? Five writers ask whether society has lost its way when it comes to the most intimate of human acts. on.wsj.com/3wiBfYB on.wsj.com/3wiBfYB

item.title: Meir Soloveichik 写道："华盛顿穿过特拉华河 "这幅画是美国的标志，但仔细观察就会发现它比我们想象的要复杂得多，也更有意义。
item.description: The painting "Washington Crossing the Delaware" is an American icon, but a close look reveals it's more complicated and meaningful than we think, writes Meir Soloveichik on.wsj.com/48s7Vw5 on.wsj.com/48s7Vw5

item.title: 夏威夷正在考虑对游客征税，以抵消过度旅游对该州自然资源造成的损失
item.description: Hawaii is considering a tax on tourists as a means to offset the toll overtourism takes on the state’s natural resources on.wsj.com/3I3hqqT on.wsj.com/3I3hqqT

item.title: 旧金山再次迎来科技复兴，因为企业家和投资者在离开其他城市后又重新回到了这里
item.description: San Francisco is once again experiencing a tech revival as entrepreneurs and investors return after decamping to other cities on.wsj.com/49HnaST on.wsj.com/49HnaST

item.title: 一位精神科医生下载了一款赌博应用程序，以便在晚上放松心情。赌博公司让她不断下注，直到她输掉 40 多万美元。"你就是无法自拔"
item.description: A psychiatrist downloaded a gambling app to unwind at night. Gambling companies kept her betting until she lost more than $400,000. “You just can’t get out.” on.wsj.com/3OQ2Dnf

item.title: Kaia Gerber 深知作为 nepo 宝宝的好处。"她说："我个人非常清楚这对我的好处，我绝不会说任何负面的话。
item.description: Kaia Gerber is aware of the benefits of being a nepo baby. “I personally am very aware of all the wonderful things it has done for me, and I would never ever say anything negative about it,” she says. on.wsj.com/3UNeoP0 on.wsj.com/3UNeoP0

item.title: 宅在家里的闺蜜们在 TikTok 上上传了大量关于自我保健、烹饪、清洁的视频，以及对传统婚姻的理想化憧憬--少了结婚戒指
item.description: Stay-at-home girlfriends have flooded TikTok with videos of self-care, cooking, cleaning and an idealized vision of a traditional marriage—minus the wedding ring on.wsj.com/3ULoRLc on.wsj.com/3ULoRLc

item.title: 迈克尔-戴尔（Michael Dell）正在将他在波士顿的另一套顶层公寓挂牌出售，这次的价格为 1090 万美元。七个月前，这位电脑大亨曾以 3500 万美元的价格将其位于波士顿最高公寓楼的顶层公寓挂牌出售。
item.description: Michael Dell is listing another one of his Boston penthouses, this time for $10.9 million. Seven months ago, the computer mogul listed a penthouse at the city’s tallest condo tower for $35 million. on.wsj.com/430b4CB on.wsj.com/430b4CB

item.title: 从 "Feud "到时装秀，时尚和媒体都将老年女性视为偶像。这些品牌实际上是在迎合她们的衣橱和美容需求。
item.description: From “Feud” to the runway, fashion and media are idolizing older women. These brands are actually catering to their wardrobe and beauty needs. on.wsj.com/42MDVd6 on.wsj.com/42MDVd6

item.title: "她从不承认自己有问题"一个从成功人士跌落到无家可归的女人 仍然像个百万富翁一样侃侃而谈让她得到帮助似乎是不可能的
item.description: “She wasn’t ever going to admit she had a problem.” A woman who tumbled from success to homelessness still talked like a millionaire. Getting her help seemed impossible. on.wsj.com/3V2OYgP on.wsj.com/3V2OYgP

item.title: 一个简单的问题正在绊倒各地的家庭厨师：您为自己或家人烹饪时应该使用什么油？科学家和营养学家对食用油的健康选择进行了权衡。
item.description: A simple question is tripping up home cooks everywhere: What oil are you supposed to use when cooking for yourself or your family? Scientists and dietitians weigh in on healthy options for cooking oil. on.wsj.com/42COq2V on.wsj.com/42COq2V

item.title: 纳什维尔的一位建筑师多年来一直在翻新历史悠久的房屋，因此他的最新项目需要突破传统。"现代房屋不仅仅是白色的盒子"。
item.description: A Nashville architect had spent years renovating historic homes, so his latest project needed to be something that would push the envelope. “Modern houses aren’t just white boxes.” on.wsj.com/3SzfvPM on.wsj.com/3SzfvPM

item.title: 对于那些台面空间严重不足的人来说，还没开始做饭，就经常会面临厨房混乱的局面。专业设计人员为我们提供了释放工作空间的省心妙招。
item.description: Those of us critically short of counter space regularly face kitchen chaos before we even start cooking. Design pros offer sanity-saving ideas for freeing up work space. on.wsj.com/3uH6Um3 on.wsj.com/3uH6Um3

item.description: What is the best way to prepare a steak? Five butchers share their tried and true steps, including how to buy, prepare and cook your meat to perfection. on.wsj.com/49BN1vz on.wsj.com/49BN1vz

item.title: 一个穿着 "Zaddy "衬衫的毛绒玩具。休-海夫纳（Hugh Hefner）式的长袍。Build-A-Bear转向嬉皮小熊，引来笑声和咆哮声；"Build-A-Bear，你发情了吗？
item.description: A stuffed animal wearing a “Zaddy” shirt. Hugh Hefner-esque robes. Build-A-Bear pivots toward risqué bears, prompting grins and growls; "Build-A-Bear, are you in heat?" on.wsj.com/3ujCO8h

item.title:
泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift），看看你让我们做了什么。足球比赛在时尚界大放异彩，设计师们将校队造型提升到了一个新的高度。
下面教你如何穿上运动风夹克，让自己看起来像个时尚达人，而不是啦啦队长。
item.description:
Taylor Swift, look what you made us do. Football games are scoring big in the fashion department, as designers are taking the varsity look to a new level.

Here's how to wear athletic-inspired jackets and look like a style maven, not a cheerleader.👇 on.wsj.com/3OCTzlv

item.title: 和平与宁静有其存在的意义。但是，从圣莫里茨的滑雪季到狂欢节期间的里约热内卢，一些旺季旅游目的地值得大肆宣传。
item.description: Peace and quiet have their place. But—from ski season in St. Moritz to Rio de Janeiro during Carnival—some high-season travel destinations are worth the hype. on.wsj.com/3HUrum0 on.wsj.com/3HUrum0

item.title: 多年来，科技行业在很大程度上远离旧金山的政治。现在不会了"够了够了，我们要卷入泥潭"
item.description: For years, the tech industry largely stayed away from San Francisco politics. Not anymore. “Enough is enough, we’re getting involved in the muck.” on.wsj.com/3OD4bRy on.wsj.com/3OD4bRy
